medical_history.chief_complaint: Loss of vision in her left eye.
medical_history.history_of_present_illness: Painless visual loss in her left eye developed over several days. She described the vision in her left eye as 'similar to looking through a dirty screen door.' Frontal throbbing headaches associated with nausea occurred over the preceding months. Two weeks before presentation, she experienced several days of nausea and vomiting attributed to viral gastroenteritis.
medical_history.past_medical_history: Hypertension and hypothyroidism secondary to ablative therapy for Graves disease.
medical_history.family_history: Family history of sarcoidosis: 2 of her 8 siblings had sarcoidosis but none had neurologic involvement.
